This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS permissions policy "payment" is not supported in cross-origin iframe without allow="payment" attribute
FAIL permissions policy "payment" can be enabled in cross-origin iframe using allow="payment" attribute assert_equals: expected "OK" but got "NotAllowedError#The operation either timed out or was not allowed. See: https://www.w3.org/TR/webauthn-2/#sctn-privacy-considerations-client."
Harness: the test ran to completion.
